direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods provide information about the state of the map, with isEmpty checking for the absence of mappings and size returning the number of mappings.
Both methods check the presence of elements in the map, with containsKey checking for a specific key and isEmpty checking for any mappings.
Both methods check the presence of elements in the map, with containsValue checking for a specific value and isEmpty checking for any mappings.
Both methods affect the state of the map, with clear removing all mappings and isEmpty checking for the absence of mappings.
Both methods affect the composition of the map, with addComposited adding a new map and isEmpty checking the overall state of the composite map.
